勢.definition: power; influence; potential; momentum; tendency; trend; situation; conditions; outward appearance; sign; gesture; male genitals

勢不兩立.definition: the two cannot exist together (idiom); irreconcilable differences; incompatible standpoints

勢不可擋.definition: see 勢不可當|势不可当[shi4 bu4 ke3 dang1]

勢不可當.definition: impossible to resist (idiom); an irresistible force

勢力.definition: power; influence; a force (military, political etc)

勢在必行.definition: circumstances require action (idiom); absolutely necessary; imperative

勢如破竹.definition: like a hot knife through butter (idiom); with irresistible force

勢必.definition: to be bound to; undoubtedly will

勢成騎虎.definition: if you ride a tiger, it's hard to get off (idiom); fig. impossible to stop halfway

勢頭.definition: power; momentum; tendency; impetus; situation; the look of things
